analysis.description:
GridcubePlatformToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/23/0x1e867d04fbb7434093071237813df00b3df6ee77.sol#137) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x1e867d04fbb7434093071237813df00b3df6ee77.sol#262-273)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0x1e867d04fbb7434093071237813df00b3df6ee77.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/23/0x1e867d04fbb7434093071237813df00b3df6ee77.sol#27): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x1e867d04fbb7434093071237813df00b3df6ee77.sol#113-114) is not in mixedCase
